--- # Note that when developing locally, this page must be reached by visiting /gorefs.html. Without # the .html extension (/gorefs), an index page for the gorefs directory generated by the # jekyll-datapage-generator plugin will be displayed instead. This is a quirk of the Jekyll # development web server. When deployed on GitHub pages, this page will be available at /gorefs # without the .html extension. layout: default ---
